Keyword.DESCRIPTION: Dodge the next time you would lose HP.

1.At the start of your turn, you could get SP card based on your #rp point. NL 2.The SP card you can get also decided by the card in your hand. NL 3.All the SP card has #yExhaust and #yEthereal . NL 4.The rest of rule need you to find it out!
This card cannot be Upgraded, but can be Transform to other card at Rest Sites.
This card will Replace a particular card in your hand, effect last until this card is Exhausted.
Add a copy of itself into your hand when it's Exhausted.
This card would not work immediately when used, but you can trigger it at anytime to make it work.
Will not be affected at all times.
When a turn ends or its owner attack, make the owner loss hp equal to its level.
Weather power will provide extra effect for you.
Simple Doll could be Armed to Spear Doll, Shield Doll or Archer Doll.
Spear Doll will provide #yStrength for you. Whenever you get #b3 Spear Doll will give you extra #b1 #yStrength.
Shield Doll will gain #yBlock for you at the end of turn.
Archer Doll will deal damage to a a random enemy at the end of turn.
ShangHai Doll will provide Strength for you. When it be Evoked, will deal damage to all enemy. (Belong to Spear Doll)
PengLai Doll will provide Strength for you. When it be Evoked, will deal damage to all enemy. (Belong to Spear Doll)
HeLan Doll will gain Block for you at the end of turn. When it be Evoked, will gain #yPlated #yArmor for you. (Belong to Shield Doll)
Spear Doll: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy. Shield Doll: Gain 2 Block for you. Every 2 Archer Doll: heal 1 HP for you.
Element Card will produce or consume corresponding Element Orb. (Multiple Element means consume)
When you play a Element Card, if you have the #yDimensity with corresponding element,consume it/them, play this card again and gain [E] . (But won't produce or consume corresponding Element Orb)
Purely Damage will ignore target's Block, and won't be affected by thorns.
Blessing Card will #yExhaust and works when it is drawn.
If this card/relic is not in your deck/relic list, it will add into your deck/relic list, including your next run. (It can be removed only by special condition)
When you have 2 or more #yElement orb of same #yElement(Except Luna and Sun), and you play a #yElement card with same #yElement. #yExhaust 2 #yElement orb, trigger #yResonance effect.
Its owner lose #b1 #yStrength for each Sticky Bubble, take effect at the end of turn. Reduce #b1 at the start of turn. If stacked more than #b4, its owner stun for #b1 turn.
Every same name card in your draw pile/hand/discard pile will increase its effect by 1.
If you have same name card in your draw pile when you play this card, draw that card.
Right click to activate it.
Its effect is unknown.
If has other Abnormity, this Abnormity's effect will increase.
If you don't have #yDoll to evoke, use a secondary effect instead.
You can choose whether #yExhaust or not when use this card.
